attributes.action: Ban the use if puberty blockers in clinical trials on children
attributes.additional_details: Ban the use of puberty blockers fir children in clinical trials
attributes.background: We must stop the abuse if children via clinical trials with puberty blockers. These cause irreversible damage with many children realising later in life, they were simply a tomboy, or had body dismorphia or other mental health issues. We must protect children from being used as guinea pigs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751839
